Yom Kippur.Significance: Atonement for personal sins, fate of each person is sealed for the upcoming year
Yom Kippur.Observances: Fasting | prayer | abstaining from physical pleasures | refraining from work
Yom Kippur.Related to: Rosh Hashanah, which precedes Yom Kippur
